entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Emerson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Emerson 3:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
